osyfe

Class InputEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.InputEvent

  • public class InputEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an input event. It is one of:
    - (KEY) key event
    - (TEXT) text key event
    - (CLICK) mouse click event
    - (MOUSE) mouse move event
    - (WHEEL) mouse wheel event

    Not related properties are set to -1.
